title: Start Screen 01
description: A simple start screen with a large illustration and a signup button.

title: Start Screen 02
description: A start screen with a background image and a prominent call-to-action.

title: Start Screen 03
description: A start screen with a carousel of features and a login button.

title: Start Screen 04
description: A start screen with a video background and social login options.

title: Start Screen 05
description: A minimalist start screen with a logo and a single entry button.

title: Signup Screen 01
description: A clean and simple signup screen with email/password fields and a signup button.

title: Signup Screen 02
description: A signup screen with social media integration options (Google, Facebook, etc.).

description: A multi-step signup process with a progress indicator.

description: A signup screen with a background image and translucent form.

description: A signup screen with password strength indicator and validation.

title: Signup Screen 06
description: A modal signup form that can be displayed over other content.

description: A walkthrough screen with animated illustrations.

description: A walkthrough screen with a video background.

description: A walkthrough screen with interactive elements.

description: A loading screen with a custom animation.

title: Loading Screen 03
description: A loading screen with a progress bar and percentage display.

description: A loading screen with a random motivational quote.

description: A skeleton screen that mimics the layout of the upcoming content.

description: A basic profile screen with a user avatar, name, and bio.

description: A profile screen with a tabbed view for posts, followers, and following.

description: A profile screen with a grid of user photos or posts.

description: A profile screen with a prominent header image and a floating action button for editing.

description: A profile screen that displays user statistics and achievements.

description: A feed of cards with images and short descriptions.

title: Feed Screen 04
description: A feed with a pull-to-refresh functionality.

description: A feed that supports infinite scrolling.

description: An article screen with a comments section.

description: A screen for creating a new post with an image upload.

description: A screen for creating a new post with location tagging.

description: A screen for creating a new post with a category selection.
